overview: UMFPACK is a suite of sparse matrix solvers for large-scale numerical computations, particularly focusing on solving sparse linear systems efficiently. It offers a range of direct and iterative solvers optimized for sparse matrices arising in diverse scientific and engineering applications.
core_features: Direct and iterative solvers for sparse linear systems
Support for symmetric and unsymmetric matrices
Efficient handling of large-scale sparse matrices
Optimized for numerical computations in scientific simulations
